text:
Hey there,

I want to track CPA from our funnel in our SaaS Tool. When a user registers for our tool, a new contact + deal are created in HubSpot via the API. However, I would also need to track the UTM parameters for the registration in HubSpot to see what my CPA is.

Is that somehow possible via the API?

I know that it is in theory possible through the tracking code. Problem is that the code is only activated on an opt-in basis.

Thanks in Advance!
Andy

Replace custom with custom object type in the url.. 
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/obe-type/objectid|https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/obe-type/objectid>
It will something like 2-434343

Thanks for your insights!
Please may I know where I can find my custom objects `id` in HubSpot?

Hey <@U03MLCLS5BN> and <@UD53A9UUR>, I noticed the Scopes List for the APIs is missing a few Scopes e.g. `crm.objects.line_items.*`  `crm.objects.quotes.*` `cms.domains.read`
Do you have somewhere I can log a Ticket?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth#scopes>

I will get this to the docs team!
Thanks for reporting!
